title: NPM : Install Dependencies
mainDescription: There dependencies are managed into 2 types :
1. Dev Dependencies (--save-dev .The dependencies only required for development)
postDescription: We can see how the dependencies are added under devDependencies(loadash) and dependencies(express).

title: NPM : List
mainDescription: <-- npm list --> is used to display all the dependencies which we have installed.
we can also give a --depth option which will give the package listing to a specific depth.
Below snapshot will clear it off.
code: npm list --global true ( To check the packages which are installed globally.

title: NPM : Uninstall Packages
mainDescription: We have two dependencies installed now. Let us uninstall loadash.
code: npm uninstall loaddash (will remove the package from node_modules)
npm uninstall loaddash --save-dev (will remove from node_modules + package.json)
